playwright.description: Playwright MCP server for browser automation, visual regression testing, and cross-browser UI validation. Provides tools to navigate pages, interact with DOM elements, capture screenshots, test responsive layouts, and validate rendered component output across Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.

github.description: GitHub MCP server for repository operations, pull request management, and CI/CD integration. Used to create component library PRs with visual diffs, manage design system versioning, track frontend issues, and enforce quality gates on UI changes.

gitlab.description: GitLab MCP server for merge request management, pipeline monitoring, and design system release automation. Used to enforce accessibility and performance gates on merge requests and publish component library packages.
